briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Adjustable Gastric Band Operations for Patients With Body Mass Index (BMI) Between 30-40 kg/m2
officialTitle: A Prospective Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of LAP-BAND速 Adjustable Gastric Band (LAGB速) Operations for Patients With BMI Between 30-40 kg/m2 With Co-morbidities
summary: This study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Gastric Banding for patients with body mass index (BMI) between 30-40 kg/m2 with medical conditions related to obesity.

primaryOutcome.measure: To Determine Percent of Excess Weight Loss (%EWL) After Laparoscopic Adjustable Gastric Banding Surgery
